inclusion.criterion: chronic liver disease consistent with chronic hepatitis C
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: The recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma and was only remarkable for chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis.

inclusion.criterion: evidence of hepatitis C within the 48 weeks prior to entry
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: His medical records show previous positive HCV RNA tests and a positive enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies.

inclusion.criterion: agree to use 2 barrier methods of birth control during the study and for 6 months after stopping the medications
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe mental illness, especially depression, or have been hospitalized for mental illness within the previous 24 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has chronic liver disease consistent with chronic hepatitis C and evidence of hepatitis C within the past 48 weeks. He is HIV-positive and meets one of the sets of guidelines for anti-HIV treatment.
